description:
AditMicrosys based is a full-service provider of global custom mobile app, web, web apps, and graphic motion and animation development company. It has esteemed clientele from all continents and around 30 countries.
Since 1994, we become an impetus for our client’s business. This is possible by developing innovative, futuristic, operational, minimalist, and inventive website and application for client’s business.
We have an intense team of designers, developers, and testers whose passion reflects in our work. We are dedicated to leveraging our expertise and experience for our clients in order to reduce their IT costs, improve process management, and reduce time to market for new product ideas. We provide a wide range of services including Offshore Development, Application Development, Mobile Applications, Web Design, Consulting, Product Lifecycle Management, and Database Management Services.
We are dedicated to providing services in the domains of Mobile Applications, Web Development, Custom Applications, Legacy Systems Migration, Design and Animation, E-Learning, and E-Content Solutions.
Our Vision: 
Our focus and vision have always been to invest in Client Relationships & maintain them while achieving better ROI for our clientele. We achieve this by constantly upgrading our talent pool and researching in newer technologies, creating a niche domain expertise which in turn benefits our clientele.
